title: Come to Our Grand Opening Spooktacular!
post: Come visit us for our Grand Opening on Saturday, Oct. 31 - that's right, Halloween! Bring your pooch and your appetite, and help us celebrate Piccoli Morsi's Grand Opening Spooktacular! In addition to a tempting array of classic Italian entrees, we also feature our exclusive 'Cane Cucina' menu, prepared especially for your four-footed friend. Now you can dine right alongside each other in cheerful, cozy Euro-style.
